title: JSON schema for the ASP.NET LaunchSettings.json files.

windowsAuthentication.description: Set to true to enable windows authentication for your site in IIS and IIS Express.

anonymousAuthentication.description: Set to true to enable anonymous authentication for your site in IIS and IIS Express.

iisExpress.description: Site settings to use with IISExpress profiles.

iis.description: Site settings to use with IIS profiles.

applicationUrl.description: The URL of the web site.

sslPort.description: The SSL Port to use for the web site.

commandName.description: Identifies the debug target to run.

commandLineArgs.description: The arguments to pass to the target being run.

executablePath.description: An absolute or relative path to the to the executable.

workingDirectory.description: Sets the working directory of the command.

launchBrowser.description: Set to true if the browser should be launched.

launchUrl.description: The relative URL to launch in the browser.

environmentVariables.description: Set the environment variables as key/value pairs.

applicationUrl.description: A semi-colon delimited list of URL(s) to configure for the web server.

nativeDebugging.description: Set to true to enable native code debugging.

externalUrlConfiguration.description: Set to true to disable configuration of the site when running the Asp.Net Core Project profile.

use64Bit.description: Set to true to run the 64 bit version of IIS Express, false to run the x86 version.
